Enum InstructionReportErrorCodeEnum

Namespace
BetfairDotNet.Enums.Betting
Assembly
BetfairDotNet.dll
[JsonConverter(typeof(EmptyStringToEnumConverter<InstructionReportErrorCodeEnum>))]
public enum InstructionReportErrorCodeEnum

Fields

BET_IN_PROGRESS = 4

The bet is in progress.

BET_LAPSED_PRICE_IMPROVEMENT_TOO_LARGE = 27

Your bet is lapsed. There is better odds than requested available in the market, but your preferences don't allow the system to match your bet against better odds. Change your betting preferences to accept better odds if you don't want to receive this error.

BET_TAKEN_OR_LAPSED = 3

The bet has been taken or has lapsed.

CANCELLED_NOT_PLACED = 18

The bet was cancelled; it was not placed.

ERROR_IN_MATCHER = 13

There was an error in the matcher component.

ERROR_IN_ORDER = 15

There was an error with the order.

INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS = 11

The account has insufficient funds.

INVALID_BACK_LAY_COMBINATION = 14

Invalid combination of back and lay.

INVALID_BET_ID = 17

The bet ID was invalid.

INVALID_BET_SIZE = 1

The bet size was invalid.

INVALID_BID_TYPE = 16

The bid type was invalid.

INVALID_CUSTOMER_ORDER_REF = 25

The supplied customer order reference is too long.

INVALID_MIN_FILL_SIZE = 26

The minFillSize must be greater than zero and less than or equal to the order's size. The minFillSize cannot be less than the minimum bet size for your currency

INVALID_ODDS = 10

The odds are invalid.

INVALID_ORDER_TYPE = 23

You have specified a time in force of FILL_OR_KILL, but have included a non-LIMIT order type.

INVALID_PERSISTENCE_TYPE = 12

The persistence type is invalid.

INVALID_PRICE_EDIT = 9

Attempt to edit a bet with an invalid price.

INVALID_RUNNER = 2

The specified runner does not exist or is no longer applicable for the market.

LOSS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED = 7

The requested action would exceed the user's loss limit.

MARKET_NOT_OPEN_FOR_BETTING = 6

The market is not currently open for betting.

MARKET_NOT_OPEN_FOR_BSP_BETTING = 8

The market is not open for BSP betting.

NONE = 0

The bet placed succesfully.

NO_ACTION_REQUIRED = 20

No action was required.

RELATED_ACTION_FAILED = 19

A related action, such as an order, failed.

RUNNER_REMOVED = 5

The runner has been removed from the market.

TIME_IN_FORCE_CONFLICT = 21

You may only specify a time in force on either the place request OR on individual limit order instructions (not both), since the implied behaviors are incompatible.

UNEXPECTED_MIN_FILL_SIZE = 24

You have specified a minFillSize on a limit order, where the limit order's time in force is not FILL_OR_KILL. Using minFillSize is not supported where the time in force of the request (as opposed to an order) is FILL_OR_KILL.

UNEXPECTED_PERSISTENCE_TYPE = 22

You have specified a persistence type for a FILL_OR_KILL order, which is nonsensical because no umatched portion can remain after the order has been placed.
